boardgame.name: Mini Rails
箱庭鉄道
迷你鐵道王
boardgame.description: Mini Rails distills the essence of the stock-buying and track-laying game genre into a tight experience that can be finished under an hour._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game includes only two types of actions _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Buy Shares_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Build Tracks_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; and you must carefully decide how to best use them. You must do each action exactly once per round, and which company you choose affects the turn order on the next round._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Episode 118 -- The Ranch of Failed Sessions
Episode 121 -- A Procession of Excited Dogs
Episode 148 Joe Sallen_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Top Games and Disappointments of 2017
Episode 9 - Sexual Innuendo: The name of my new Worker Placement Game
The Good The Board and The Playstyle?: Episode 129 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Playstyle_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;
The Good The Board and The Suggestive: Episode 131 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Evocative Mechanisms_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet

Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable
